displayName.german: Kein Stein bleibt auf dem anderen

description.japanese: すべての実績とトロフィーを獲得する
description.spanish: Consigue todos los logros/trofeos.

description.brazilian: Escape o Submundo e seja revivido no Atromitos
description.english: Escape the Underworld and get revived on the Atromitos
description.french: Fuir les Enfers et revenir à la vie sur l'Atromitos
description.german: Entkomme aus dem Schattenreich Tartarus und werde auf der Atromitos wiederbelebt.
description.italian: Fuggi dagli Inferi e rianimati sulla Atromitos.
description.japanese: 冥界を抜け、アトロミトスにて甦る
description.norwegian: Flykt fra Underverdenen og bli gjenopplivet på Atromitos
description.russian: Покиньте Подземный мир и возродитесь на «Атромитосе»
description.schinese: 逃离冥界并在阿特罗米托斯处复活
description.spanish: Escapa del Inframundo y revive en la Atrómitos.

description.brazilian: Ative a primeira câmara de Circe
description.french: Activer le premier local de Circé
description.italian: Attiva la prima Camera di Circe.
description.japanese: 最初のキルケの間を起動する
description.spanish: Activa la primera cámara de Circe.

description.brazilian: Ative todas as câmaras de Circe
description.french: Activer tous les locaux de Circé
description.italian: Attiva tutte le Camere di Circe.
description.japanese: すべてのキルケの間を起動する
description.spanish: Activa todas las cámaras de Circe.

description.brazilian: Adquira todos os fragmentos e núcleos Nyx
description.english: Acquire all nyx fragments and cores
description.french: Obtenir tous les noyaux et fragments de Nyx
description.italian: Ottieni tutti i frammenti e i nuclei di Nyx.
description.japanese: すべてのニュクスの断片とコアを入手する
description.russian: Соберите все фрагменты и ядра Нюкты
description.schinese: 获取所有倪克斯碎片与核心
description.spanish: Consigue todos los fragmentos y núcleos de nocturna.

description.french: Faites terminer le collier par Héphaïstos
description.italian: Fai completare la collana da Efesto.
description.japanese: ヘパイストスに首飾りを完成させる
description.schinese: 让赫菲斯托斯完成项链
description.spanish: Haz que Hefesto complete el collar.

description.italian: Ottieni tutti i nuclei di Aether.
description.japanese: すべてのエーテルコアを入手する
description.spanish: Consigue todos los núcleos etéricos.

description.italian: Meravigliati davanti alla statua del guerriero.
description.japanese: 戦士の像に心を奪われる
description.spanish: Maravíllate ante la estatua del Guerrero.

description.french: Admirer la statue de la Chasseuse
description.italian: Meravigliati davanti alla statua della cacciatrice.
description.japanese: 女狩人の像に心を奪われる
description.spanish: Maravíllate ante la estatua de la Cazadora.

description.italian: Meravigliati davanti alla statua del marinaio.
description.japanese: 航海者の像に心を奪われる
description.spanish: Maravíllate ante la estatua del Marinero.

description.italian: Meravigliati davanti alla statua degli amanti.
description.japanese: 恋人たちの像に心を奪われる
description.spanish: Maravíllate ante la estatua de los Amantes.

description.french: Admirer la statue de la Jouvencelle
description.italian: Meravigliati davanti alla statua della fanciulla.
description.japanese: 乙女の像に心を奪われる
description.spanish: Maravíllate ante la estatua de la Doncella.

description.brazilian: Encontre e admire todas as estátuas
description.english: Discover and marvel at all the statues
description.french: Découvrir et admirer toutes les statues
description.italian: Scopri e ammira tutte le statue.
description.japanese: すべての像を見つけ出し、その美に心を奪われる
description.schinese: 发现并惊叹于所有雕像
description.spanish: Descubre todas las estatuas y maravíllate ante ellas.

description.japanese: 真実を発見する
description.spanish: Descubre la verdad.

description.japanese: 進行度50％を達成する
description.spanish: Completa el 50 % del juego.

description.japanese: 進行度75％を達成する
description.spanish: Completa el 75 % del juego.

description.japanese: 進行度100％を達成する
description.spanish: Completa el 100 % del juego.

description.japanese: フェニックスを討伐する
description.spanish: Mata al Fénix.

description.japanese: サイクロプスを討伐する
description.spanish: Mata al Cíclope.

description.japanese: ステュムパーロス像を討伐する
description.spanish: Destruye la estatua de Estatua de Estinfalia.

description.japanese: センティマネスを討伐する
description.spanish: Mata a los centimanes.

description.japanese: 脱出カプセルを起動する
description.spanish: Activa las cápsulas de rescate.

description.brazilian: Derrote Aether e Nyx e ascenda ao seu lugar de direito
description.english: Slay Aether and Nyx and ascend to your rightful place
description.french: Terrasser Éther et Nyx pour prendre votre place légitime
description.german: Bezwinge Aether und Nyx und nimm deinen rechtmäßigen Platz ein.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Aether e Nyx, e ascendi al posto che meriti.
description.japanese: エーテルとニュクスを討伐し、真の地位へと駆け上がる
description.koreana: Aether와 Nyx를 쓰러뜨리고 당신의 정당한 자리로 승천하세요
description.norwegian: Drep Aether og Nyx og stig opp til din rettmessige plass
description.russian: Победите Эфира и Нюкту и взойдите на своё законное место
description.schinese: 击杀以太与倪克斯并登上你应得的位置
description.spanish: Mata a Éter y Nix y asciende al lugar que te corresponde.

description.brazilian: Derrote Harmonia e pereça com o Atromitos
description.english: Slay Harmonia and perish with the Atromitos
description.french: Terrasser Harmonie et périr avec l'Atromitos
description.german: Erschlage Harmonia und gehe mit der Atromitos zugrunde.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Harmonia e perisci con la Atromitos.
description.japanese: ハルモニアを倒し、アトロミトスとともに滅びる
description.norwegian: Drep Harmonia og gå under med Atromitos
description.russian: Победите Гармонию и погибните вместе с «Атромитосом»
description.schinese: 击杀哈耳摩尼亚并与阿特罗米托斯同归于尽
description.spanish: Mata a Armonía y muere con la Atrómitos.

description.japanese: 首飾りを身につける
description.spanish: Ponte el collar.

description.italian: Lascia che Harmonia indossi la collana.
description.japanese: ハルモニアに首飾りを着けさせる
description.schinese: 让哈耳摩尼亚戴上项链
description.spanish: Deja que Armonía se ponga el collar.

description.brazilian: Inspire todos os sobreviventes para dar a eles uma chance de sobreviver.
description.english: Inspire all survivors to give them a chance at surviving.
description.french: Encourager les survivants pour leur donner une chance de survivre
description.german: Inspiriere alle Überlebenden, um ihnen eine Chance zum Überleben zu geben.
description.italian: Inspira tutti i superstiti per dare loro una possibilità di sopravvivenza.
description.japanese: すべての生存者に生き抜く勇気を与える
description.koreana: 모든 생존자들의 용기를 북돋아 생존할 기회를 제공하세요
description.norwegian: Inspirer alle overlevende for å gi dem en sjanse til å overleve
description.russian: Вдохновите всех выживших и дайте им шанс спастись
description.schinese: 激励所有幸存者，给予他们生存的机会
description.spanish: Inspira a todos los supervivientes para que tengan una oportunidad de escapar.

description.brazilian: Alguns dos sobreviventes escaparam do Atromitos
description.english: Some of the survivors escaped the Atromitos
description.german: Einige der Überlebenden entkamen von der Atromitos.
description.italian: Alcuni dei superstiti sono fuggiti dalla Atromitos.
description.japanese: 生存者の一部がアトロミトスから脱出した
description.norwegian: Noen av de overlevende rømte fra Atromitos
description.schinese: 部分幸存者逃离了阿特罗米托斯
description.spanish: Algunos supervivientes de la Atrómitos han escapado.

displayName.japanese: 歓喜にあふれる生存者たち

description.brazilian: Todos os sobreviventes escaparam do Atromitos
description.english: All of the survivors escaped the Atromitos
description.french: Tous les survivants ont fui l'Atromitos
description.german: Alle Überlebenden entkamen von der Atromitos.
description.italian: Tutti i superstiti sono fuggiti dalla Atromitos.
description.japanese: すべての生存者はアトロミトスから脱出した
description.norwegian: Alle de overlevende rømte fra Atromitos
description.schinese: 所有幸存者逃离了阿特罗米托斯
description.spanish: Todos los supervivientes de la Atrómitos han escapado.

description.brazilian: Todos os sobreviventes pereceram no Atromitos
description.english: All of the survivors perished on the Atromitos
description.french: Tous les survivants ont péri sur l'Atromitos
description.german: Alle Überlebenden kamen auf der Atromitos um.
description.italian: Tutti i superstiti sono morti sulla Atromitos.
description.japanese: すべての生存者がアトロミトスで命を落とした
description.schinese: 所有幸存者在阿特罗米托斯丧生
description.spanish: Todos los supervivientes de la Atrómitos han muerto.

description.japanese: 最初の強化を行う
description.spanish: Realiza tu primera mejora.

description.japanese: グラディウスを完全に強化する
description.spanish: Mejora la gladius por completo.

description.italian: Potenzia completamente la Lancia del legionario.
description.japanese: レギオネアスピアを完全に強化する
description.spanish: Mejora la lanza legionaria al completo.

description.spanish: Mejora Juicio por completo.

description.italian: Potenzia completamente le lanterne di Aether.
description.japanese: エーテルランタンを完全に強化する
description.spanish: Mejora los faroles etéricos al completo.

displayName.japanese: 祝福されしニュクスのシールド

description.french: Améliorer totalement le bouclier de Nyx
description.italian: Potenzia completamente lo Scudo di Nyx.
description.japanese: ニュクスシールドを完全に強化する
description.spanish: Mejora el escudo de Nix al completo.

description.spanish: Mejora la explosión de nocturna al completo.

description.spanish: Consigue todas las mejoras.

description.japanese: アービターの武器を見つける
description.spanish: Encuentra el arma Juicio.

description.japanese: ノクターナルブラストを見つける
description.spanish: Encuentra el arma Explosión de nocturna.

description.spanish: Consigue la lanza legionaria.

description.spanish: Consigue Planeo.

description.spanish: Consigue Corriente lumínica.

description.spanish: Consigue Invocar lanza.

description.japanese: サンダリングスピアを入手する
description.spanish: Consigue la lanza hendedora.

description.spanish: Consigue Supernova.

description.spanish: Consigue Impulso planeador.
